short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension designed for developers, where different developer tools can be unified.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DevToolsHelper is your all-in-one solution for seamless development! With a wide range of tools, including compilers for JavaScript, PHP, SQL, and HTML playgrounds, as well as comparers, format converters, and utilities such as JWT and Lorem Ipsum generators, our add-on streamlines your workflow like never before. Enjoy flexible access directly from DevTools, integrated compilers for efficient coding, versatile format conversion tools, and instant access to comprehensive documentation for multiple languages and frameworks. Improve your productivity and coding experience today - download DevToolsHelper now!
